attributes.action: Get Abeku to bring the radio back
attributes.background: On the 13th March 2019, Abeku took the radio from us. This is a petition to get it back.

rejection.details:
This decision is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

If someone has take your property without your permission, you could contact the police to report it as a crime:

https://www.police.uk/contact/
